Attributes.description: The contribution of the senses to knowledge of the external world; the nature of perception and its contribution to empirical knowledge.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) PHIL 240 or (b) COGS 200. (If COGS 200, accompanied by 3 credits in PHIL at the 200-level or above.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 15:00, End Time: 16:00, Building: MacLeod, Room: 2002
